page.title: 17Windsurfing in Dale
page.content: Many visitors and some local people enjoy windsurfing in Dale Bay.It is particularly suitable for beginners because there are seldom very big waves and a good rescue service is available from the coastguards and from the West Wales Windsurfing School.Windsurfing is also popular because cars can be parked by the water's edge and boards launched easily.Spares,boards and wetsuits can be obtained from the nearby shop.The usual windsurfing area is about 2 sq.km,though some experts like to go for longer trips.Lessons and courses are given by the windsurfing school,and people can learn the basic techniques in about a day.There is hardly a day from April to Oct. when there are no windsurfers out sailing and in the height of the summer season up to 60 boards a day may be seen.
